Title: Ship faster. Stress Less. Idea to ops with Azure and GitHub Copilot | BRK109
Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Explore how GitHub Copilot and intelligent agents streamline Azure application development from design to operations. This session covers how the Coding Agent, App Modernization agent, and cloud architecture agent accelerate planning and coding, while GitHub Copilot for Azure and the Azure MCP Server simplify deployment and diagnostics. Learn how the SRE Agent and testing agent extend automation into production and quality assurance, enabling end-to-end DevOps with AI-powered workflows.

To learn more, please check out these resources: \* https://aka.ms/ignite25-plans-AgenticDevOpsGitHubCopilot \* https://github.com/features/copilot?utm\_source=brk109-copilot-features-cta&utm\_medium=web&utm\_campaign=ghignite25 \* https://docs.github.com/en/copilot/concepts/agents/coding-agent/about-coding-agent?utm\_source=brk109-docs-coding-agent&utm\_medium=web&utm\_campaign=ghignite25 \* https://github.com/features/copilot/copilot-business?utm\_source=brk109-cfb-features-cta&utm\_medium=web&utm\_campaign=ghignite25 \* https://github.com/features/copilot/agents?utm\_source=brk109-agents-features-cta&utm\_medium=web&utm\_campaign=ghignite25 ğ—¦ğ—½ğ—²ğ—®ğ—¸ğ—²ğ—¿ğ˜€: \* Nir Mashkowski \* Mandy Whaley ğ—¦ğ—²ğ˜€ğ˜€ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—» ğ—œğ—»ğ—³ğ—¼ğ—¿ğ—ºğ—®ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—»: This is one of many sessions from the Microsoft Ignite 2025 event.
